entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Owen Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:46 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 02:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -4.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.0 km
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -5.4°C
Wind: ENE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then clearing. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
